name: DECENTRALISE RURAL EDUCATION AWARENESS MOVEMENT SOCIETY (DREAM)
briefDescription: A brief history of DREAM SocietyWith a vision to uplift backward and marginalized sections of the community and a passion for social development since very young, a group of fifteen individuals motivated by the urge for social development of their village came together to form ‘Friends youth association’ (F.Y.A) in Dhannur (B) village of Adilabad district of Telangana.  Initially the group addressed issues such as superstition, alcohol brewing and its consumption.  Awareness programs succeeded in completely banning alcohol brewing and its consumption in Dhannur village and adjoining six other villages.  Women who used to patronize self-proclaimed god men are refraining from doing so.  These successes motivated the members of FYA to formall
